Text:
Latest news ke mutaabik 'Rang Rasiya' kuchh banned thi India mein.. Isliye Ketan Mehta saahab ne court case ke chalte kaafi lambe waqt tak intezar kar thak chukne ke baad kahin 'West' mein release ki thi (US yaa UK mein shaayad)...

Malikjee, aap kaise hain ?

Aur, sab bhai bandhu log... kaise ho sab, yaaron ?

@ malik bhai
yeah, maine bhi yahin suna Rang Rasiya ke baare me.
aur main mumbai ka rehnewala hun.....agar yahan release hoti toh zaroor dekhne jaatha. kyunki yeh film aakhir ketan mehta ji ne banaya hai..

@ haminasto bhai
main theek taak hun...aasha hai aap bhi kush ho
Raj Kiran rarity, super rip n share n effort bhai, hope Raj Kiran is in good health n spirits where ever he is, And Malikjee thx a load for this ;un, cheers :)
